term.title: coherent radiation

item.text: Radiation emitted by a source when all the elementary waves emitted have a phase difference constant in space and time.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2223. 'Glossary of terms used in photochemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2233 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122223)
